Building a FIRST LEGO League Table

The following discussion is based on conversations in the Facebook Group FLL: Share & Learn.

What are different tables you can build?

FIRST LEGO League tables take up space. For many teams, having an alternative design that lets you store the table easily is useful. Below are a list of useful alternative table designs.

Photo Credit: Lance Salyers

Landroids Portable Table
Just Walls Portable FLL Field by Kuriosity Robotics
Foam Table by the Inventioneers.
FLL Table by Hands of Technology.
Tri-fold Table by Lance Salyers
Ping Pong Table-Style by Arrell Thompson:
